Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Considering its value and potential impact on your projects, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you can acquire this product for $12,000. This price not only represents a significant savings compared to the market rate but also ensures you receive the best possible value for your investment. Don't hesitate to seize this opportunity to enhance your operations with our top-tier solution. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
